nodes.documentation:
XBR Payment/Paying Channel between a XBR data consumer and the XBR market maker,
or the XBR Market Maker and a XBR data provider.
nodes.name: XBRChannel

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when payment channel is closing (that is, one of the two state channel
participants has called "close()", initiating start of the channel timeout).
nodes.name: Closing

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when payment channel has finally closed, which happens after both state
channel participants have called close(), agreeing on last state, or after the timeout
at latest - in case the second participant doesn't react within timeout)
nodes.name: Closed

nodes.documentation: The XBR Market ID this channel is operating payments for.
nodes.name: channelType

nodes.documentation: The XBR Market ID this channel is operating payments for.
nodes.name: channelState

nodes.documentation: The XBR Market ID this channel is operating payments for.
nodes.name: marketId

nodes.documentation: The sender of the payments in this channel. Either a XBR Consumer or XBR Market Maker (delegate).
nodes.name: sender

nodes.documentation:
The delegate working for the sender, and using this channel to pay for data keys. E.g. a
XBR Consumer (delegate) or XBR Provider (delegate).
nodes.name: delegate

nodes.documentation: Recipient of the payments in this channel. Either a XBR Market Maker (delegate) or a XBR Provider.
nodes.name: recipient

nodes.documentation: Amount of XBR held in the channel.
nodes.name: amount

nodes.documentation: Block number when the channel was created.
nodes.name: openedAt

nodes.documentation: Block number when the channel was closed (finally, after the timeout).
nodes.name: closedAt

nodes.documentation:
Timeout with which the channel will be closed (the grace period during which the
channel will wait for participants to submit their last signed transaction).
nodes.name: channelTimeout

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "invalid signature (signature is valid but doesn't match the data provided)"

arguments.value: invalid signature (signature is valid but doesn't match the data provided)

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "invalid signature (signature is valid but doesn't match the data provided)"

nodes.documentation:
Trigger closing this payment channel. When the first participant has called `close()`
submitting its latest transaction/state, a timeout period begins during which the
other party of the payment channel has to submit its latest transaction/state too.
When both transaction have been submitted, and the submitted transactions/states agree,
the channel immediately closes, and the consumed amount of token in the channel is
transferred to the channel recipient, and the remaining amount of token is transferred
back to the original sender.
nodes.name: close

nodes.documentation: Timeout this state channel.
nodes.name: timeout

nodes.documentation:
Trigger closing this payment channel. When the first participant has called `close()`
submitting its latest transaction/state, a timeout period begins during which the
other party of the payment channel has to submit its latest transaction/state too.
When both transaction have been submitted, and the submitted transactions/states agree,
the channel immediately closes, and the consumed amount of token in the channel is
transferred to the channel recipient, and the remaining amount of token is transferred
back to the original sender.
nodes.name: close

nodes.documentation: Timeout this state channel.
nodes.name: timeout

params.amount: The amount of XBR held in the channel.
params.channelTimeout: The payment channel timeout period that begins with the first call to `close()`
params.delegate: The offchain delegate allowed to spend XBR offchain, from the channel,    in the name of the original sender.
params.marketId: The ID of the XBR market this payment channel is associated with.

amount().notice: Amount of XBR held in the channel.

channelState().notice: The XBR Market ID this channel is operating payments for.

channelTimeout().notice: Timeout with which the channel will be closed (the grace period during which the channel will wait for participants to submit their last signed transaction).

channelType().notice: The XBR Market ID this channel is operating payments for.

close(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32,uint.notice: Trigger closing this payment channel. When the first participant has called `close()` submitting its latest transaction/state, a timeout period begins during which the other party of the payment channel has to submit its latest transaction/state too. When both transaction have been submitted, and the submitted transactions/states agree, the channel immediately closes, and the consumed amount of token in the channel is transferred to the channel recipient, and the remaining amount of token is transferred back to the original sender.

closedAt().notice: Block number when the channel was closed (finally, after the timeout).

methods.constructor: Create a new XBR payment channel for handling microtransactions of XBR tokens.

delegate().notice: The delegate working for the sender, and using this channel to pay for data keys. E.g. a XBR Consumer (delegate) or XBR Provider (delegate).

marketId().notice: The XBR Market ID this channel is operating payments for.

openedAt().notice: Block number when the channel was created.

recipient().notice: Recipient of the payments in this channel. Either a XBR Market Maker (delegate) or a XBR Provider.

sender().notice: The sender of the payments in this channel. Either a XBR Consumer or XBR Market Maker (delegate).

userdoc.notice: XBR Payment/Paying Channel between a XBR data consumer and the XBR market maker, or the XBR Market Maker and a XBR data provider.
